meta.title: Login - MappingBitcoin
meta.description: Sign in to MappingBitcoin using your Nostr identity to add and manage Bitcoin-accepting locations.

heading: Sign In
subheading: Use your Nostr identity to access MappingBitcoin

modal.title: Log In
modal.subtitle: Sign in with your Nostr identity
modal.adminDescription: Log in with your Nostr key to access the admin panel.

description.default: Sign in with your Nostr identity. Choose your preferred method:

extension.title: Browser Extension
extension.description: Alby, nos2x, or other NIP-07 extension

key.title: Nsec / Npub Key
key.description: Enter your private (nsec) or public (npub) key
key.hint: Note: nsec gives write access, npub is read-only

bunker.description: Connect via QR code or bunker URL
bunker.scanDescription: Use your signer app to scan
bunker.scanInstructions: Scan with your Nostr signer app (Amber, nsec.app, etc.)

createAccount.popupNote: Opens in a popup. You'll be logged in automatically when done.

errors.enterKey: Please enter your nsec or npub key

info.title: What is Nostr?
info.description: Nostr is a decentralized protocol for social networking and identity. Your Nostr keys let you own your identity across apps without relying on centralized services.

admin.pleaseLogin: Please log in with a Nostr key to access the admin panel.
admin.writeRequiredDescription: Admin access requires signing capability. Please log in with an nsec key or browser extension.
admin.extensionPrompt: Your browser extension will prompt you to sign a message.
admin.bunkerPrompt: Your Nostr bunker will prompt you to sign a message.
admin.signPrompt: Sign a message to prove you control this Nostr key.
